description: The demolition of the existing buildings and the construction of 2 part five, part six and part seven storey blocks comprising 24 one bedroom, 66 two bedroom and 18 three bedroom self-contained flats on the site of Marlowe House, Bowditch and Millard House, Leeway, Pepys Estate SE8, together with associated landscaping and 74 parking spaces.
site_name: Sites of Marlowe Hse, Bowditch and Millard Hse
site_number: Sites of Marlowe Hse, Bowditch and Millard Hse
